physical_form.application: Alternative bottle material, sometimes used for larger volumes or specific markets.
Shrink wrap, cushioning materials (e.g., bubble wrap).
Increasingly used for labels and potentially closures as technology advances.

fragility.properties: Shock absorption, rigid or semi-rigid, custom molded.

fragility.application: Outer boxes for shipping, internal dividers.

fragility.properties: Crumpled or layered paper for cushioning.
Internal dividers within a cardboard box.
Suspends the product within the box, isolating it from impacts.
Reinforce the edges of boxes to prevent crushing.
Holds items together, provides some compression resistance.

shelf_life.properties: Impermeable, protects against UV light, inert.
shelf_life.application: Primary wine bottle, especially for wines sensitive to light oxidation.

shelf_life.properties: Properly sized and treated to maintain a tight seal, preventing oxidation.
Consistent seal, prevents cork taint, various oxygen permeability levels.
shelf_life.application: Bottle closure, particularly for wines intended for shorter aging periods.

shelf_life.properties: Air-tight seal, prevents oxidation, consistent performance.
shelf_life.application: Bottle closure for wines intended for early consumption.
Wine bottle labels to maintain appearance over time.

shelf_life.properties: Shields the wine from harmful UV radiation.
Removes air to prevent oxidation after opening.

shelf_life.application: Part of the bottling process, not a packaging material itself, but related.

shelf_life.properties: Absorb oxygen within the bottle headspace.
PET plastic with a layer that reduces oxygen permeability.

chemical_properties.properties: Non-reactive, doesn't leach chemicals into the wine.
Prevents interaction between the wine and closure material.
chemical_properties.application: Inside screw caps and synthetic closures.
Added to the wine itself, not a packaging material, but relevant to preservation.

chemical_properties.properties: Acidifies the wine, enhancing flavor and stability.
chemical_properties.application: Added to the wine itself, not a packaging material.

chemical_properties.properties: Low reactivity, used for liners and protective films.
Chemically resistant coating inside metal containers.
chemical_properties.application: Lining for certain types of kegs or larger format containers (rare).

chemical_properties.properties: Clarifying agent that removes unstable proteins.
chemical_properties.application: Used during wine production to stabilize the wine, indirectly impacting packaging needs.
Used during wine production to improve quality, influencing long-term stability and packaging requirements.

chemical_properties.properties: Inert, flexible, used as a sealant in closures.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Used to clean and sanitize packaging equipment and materials.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Cleaning bottles and closures before filling.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Packaging produced in a controlled environment to minimize contamination.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Specialty closures or containers for high-end wines.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Indicates if the packaging has been opened or compromised.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Capsules or seals around the bottle neck.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Designed for easy cleaning and sterilization to prevent contamination during filling.
Used once and discarded to prevent cross-contamination.
Remove airborne particles and microorganisms from the packaging environment.
Use ultraviolet light to kill microorganisms on packaging surfaces.
Sterilized product and packaging are combined in a sterile environment.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Not typically used for wine, but relevant to other beverages.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Indicate if the wine has been exposed to excessive temperatures.

temperature_sensitivity.application: Wine bottles, especially for wines sensitive to heat.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Insulating properties, protects against temperature changes.
Reflects heat away from the wine.
Absorb or release heat during phase transitions, maintaining a stable temperature.
Insulating foam commonly used for shipping temperature sensitive goods.
Help maintain low temperatures during shipping.
Record temperature fluctuations during shipping for analysis.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Tested and certified to withstand specific hazards.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Shipping wine by air or other regulated methods.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Provides a backup containment system in case of leakage.
Soaks up any leaks or spills.
Indicates the presence of alcohol and any other relevant hazards.
Indicates if the bottle has been opened, which could signify tampering or contamination.
Securely holds the cork in place to prevent it from popping out due to pressure.
Durable cardboard construction to withstand rough handling during shipping.
Separates bottles within a box to prevent breakage.
Secures cases of wine to a pallet to prevent shifting during transit.

visibility_and_display.properties: Allows the wine color to be seen.
visibility_and_display.application: Wine bottles, especially for rosé and white wines.

visibility_and_display.properties: Adds a tactile and visual element to the label.
visibility_and_display.application: Wine bottle labels for premium wines.

visibility_and_display.properties: Adds a metallic sheen to the label.
visibility_and_display.application: Wine bottle labels for premium wines.

visibility_and_display.properties: Custom shapes enhance the visual appeal.
Full-body graphics for maximum visual impact.
visibility_and_display.application: Wine bottles, particularly for promotional packaging.

visibility_and_display.properties: Designed to showcase wine bottles at retail.
Allows customers to see the wine bottle inside.
Unique bottle designs to stand out on the shelf.
Provides information about the wine, winery, and region.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Smaller size for single servings or sampling.
Larger format for aging and special occasions.
For on-tap service in restaurants and bars.
Large format bottles for aging or special events.
Large format bottles for aging or special events.
Very large format bottles for aging or special events.
Very large format bottles for aging or special events.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Indicates if the bottle has been opened or tampered with.
Unique codes for tracking and authentication.
Difficult to counterfeit, adds visual security.
Track and trace bottles throughout the supply chain.
Lockable cases for displaying high-value wines.
Minimize breakage, which can deter theft.
value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Shipping cartons with dividers and cushioning.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Can be added to labels and are only visible under UV light.
Provides a secure and transparent record of the wine's journey from vineyard to consumer.
